Features

Backlink Analytics

Backlink Analytics

It's not easy to build backlinks when you don't know what inbound links already exist in your niche. Find your best opportunities with the largest, fastest, and freshest backlink management tool.

Try It Free
Streamline Your Entire Backlink Analysis Workflow

Analyze your backlink profile, track growth, and discover backlinks faster than ever. Benchmark against competitors, and spot opportunities for high-quality backlinks with this free tool.

Filter Reports to Find Your Best Prospects
Sort backlinks by type and attribute
Identify backlink types: text, image, form, or frame
Discover the richest backlink portfolio in your niche for inspiration
Try It Free
Gather Key Backlink Information to Build Your Strategy
Check all inbound links and linking domains, subdomains, URLs, and their categories
Explore single URLs, domains, and anchors
Inspect a referring domain’s authority and location
Check IP, TLD, and location distribution
Try It Free
See How the Authority of Referring Domains Affects Your SEO

Use Authority Score to evaluate how the links from these domains may affect your website’s SEO—or your competitor’s.

Try It Free
Check Backlink Types

Use our backlink checker to analyze sponsored and user-generated content. Get a clean and structured visual report on them to see your backlink profile’s growth and diversity over time.

Try It Free
See Location Distribution

See how many backlinks come from a single IP address and various countries. Determine your competitors’ geo strategies and weed out referring domains that may make your backlink profile look shady.

Try It Free
Analyze Any Domain’s Network of Connections

See a domain’s strongest referring domains plus its connections' strongest referring domains with Network Graph. Uncover whether a site’s largest source of link equity comes from a suspicious link network or reputable websites.

Try It Free
Start using the fastest inbound links tool today
Try It Free
